name: SAKA
description:
A short RPG Maker game made by me a long time ago about saka...

===============================================================

STORY:

You play as David Woodman, who finds his old ancestor's saka after getting home from visiting his wife at the hospital. The thing wanted to get his revenge.

===============================================================

CONTROLS:

Arrows = Move
Z or ENTER = Examine
SHIFT = Run 
F4 = Fullscreen
ESC, X = Menu 

===============================================================

Story:
TheHyperH

Music:
Skyblock
Microreading

Music Title:
It's not me - TheHyperH
U R DA PRICE! - TheHyperH
Piano Vortex - Microreading
Piano Tactics - Microreading

===============================================================

This game was made by using the game engine assets and some my own... so yeahhhhhh....
